description: The purpose of this course is to develop and apply an analytical framework for the study of mass media policies, content, and effects. Successful completion of COMM130 or equivalent is required for enrollment. Weekly exercises, a midterm study proposal, and an optional research project provide opportunities for the development of special interests in mass media analysis.
name: MEDIA RESEARCH: Media Research: Yesterday, Today and Tomorrow

section.name: MEDIA RESEARCH: Media Research: Yesterday, Today and Tomorrow
